p: A pneumonia associated with acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) emerged in Wuhan, China [ 1]. The SARS-CoV-2 infection spread rapidly all over the world. As of June 12, the total number of SARS-CoV-2 cases reported by the world health organization (WHO) reached 7.553.182 and 423.349 deaths [ 2].
